verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* concerning \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in the \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and shall be \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* above the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*; and all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w flow|strong="H5102"\w* unto it.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft established: or, prepared\f*

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* ye, and let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; and he will \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* us of his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and we will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*: for out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and shall \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and they shall \w beat|strong="H3807"\w* their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* into \w plowshares|strong="H0855"\w*, and their \w spears|strong="H2595"\w* into \w pruninghooks|strong="H4211"\w*: \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* shall not lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* against \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, neither shall they \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* any more.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft pruninghooks: or, scythes\f*

O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w come|strong="H3212"\w* ye, and let us \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Therefore thou hast \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, because they be \w replenished|strong="H4390"\w* from the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, and \add are\add* \w soothsayers|strong="H6049"\w* like the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and they \w please|strong="H5606"\w* themselves in the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H5237"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft from…: or, more than the\f*\f + \fr 2.6 \ft please…: or, abound with the\f*

Their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* also is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, neither \add is there any\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of their \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*; their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is also \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, neither \add is there any\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of their \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*:

Their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* also is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*; they \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, that which their own \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* have \w made|strong="H6213"\w*:
And the mean \w man|strong="H0120"\w* boweth \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, and the great \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w humbleth|strong="H8213"\w* himself: therefore \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* them not.

¶ \w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H2934"\w* thee in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* of his \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w*.

The \w lofty|strong="H1365"\w* \w looks|strong="H5869"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall be \w humbled|strong="H8213"\w*, and the \w haughtiness|strong="H7312"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w* shall be bowed \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* alone shall be \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

For the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add shall be\add* upon every \add one that is\add* \w proud|strong="H1343"\w* and \w lofty|strong="H7311"\w*, and upon every \add one that is\add* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*; and he shall be brought \w low|strong="H8213"\w*:

And upon all the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \add that are\add* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and upon all the \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*,
And upon all the \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and upon all the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \add that are\add* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*,
And upon every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*, and upon every \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*,

And upon all the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, and upon all \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w pictures|strong="H7914"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft pleasant…: Heb. pictures of desire\f*

And the \w loftiness|strong="H1365"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall be bowed \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, and the \w haughtiness|strong="H7312"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w* shall be made \w low|strong="H8213"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* alone shall be \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
And the \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* he shall \w utterly|strong="H3632"\w* \w abolish|strong="H2498"\w*.\f + \fr 2.18 \ft he…: or, shall utterly pass away\f*

And they shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w holes|strong="H4631"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w*, and into the \w caves|strong="H4247"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* of his \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w*, when he \w ariseth|strong="H6965"\w* to shake \w terribly|strong="H6206"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 2.19 \ft of the earth: Heb. of the dust\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* his \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and his \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, which they made \add each one\add* for \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*, to the \w moles|strong="H2661"\w* and to the \w bats|strong="H5847"\w*;\f + \fr 2.20 \ft his idols of silver…: Heb. the idols of his silver, etc\f*\f + \fr 2.20 \ft each…: or, for him\f*

To \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w clefts|strong="H5366"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w*, and into the \w tops|strong="H5585"\w* of the ragged \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* of his \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w*, when he \w ariseth|strong="H6965"\w* to shake \w terribly|strong="H6206"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Cease|strong="H2308"\w* ye from \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, whose \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* \add is\add* in his \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*: for wherein is he to be accounted \w of|strong="H2803"\w*?
